Package entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Creature
    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    The entity class is the top abstract class in its hierarchy. Which allows the program to create enitities. An enitity is everything that moves on it's own.
    Since:
    8.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.awt.Rectangle bounds  
      protected Handler handler  
      protected int height  
      protected int width  
      protected float x  
      protected float y  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Entity​(Handler handler, float x, float y, int width, int height)
      The Entity constructor will never be created on it's own, therefore being abstract The Entity constructor will hold mostly the handler, positions and size In the constructor is also a default bounds Rectangle created, this is the collision bound box of the entity, which can be edited when creating a subclass object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity​(Handler handler,
              float x,
              float y,
              int width,
              int height)
        The Entity constructor will never be created on it's own, therefore being abstract The Entity constructor will hold mostly the handler, positions and size In the constructor is also a default bounds Rectangle created, this is the collision bound box of the entity, which can be edited when creating a subclass object
        Parameters:
        handler - the Handler class to have a link between the Entity class and the most used game classes
        x - the x position of the entity in px
        y - the y position of the entity in px
        width - the width for the size of the entity in px
        height - the height for the size of the entity in px

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public abstract void tick()
        the default rick method this method will be overridden by any of its initiliazed subclasses

        public abstract void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        the default render method
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics class in order to draw anything
